page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES IN WAVERTON
page.content: One of the games we play is called Walley Ball and I thought it up.Some one called it hits the ball as far as possible with a bat.Everyone then hides while he gets the ball and brings it back to the start.He then has to find everyone else beforem they can get to the ball and say Walley Ball 1.2.3.Save myself.If the person who is it sees someone he has to run to the ball and say Walley Ball 1.2.3 and name them.He tries to find and name as many people as possible before they can save themselves.When everyone is found or saved the game is over. This game is a development of Ickie Dickie.We also play Chain Tick,Base 123,Relievo,line tick,stick in the mud wall tick,ball tick,off ground tick, and elastics.Another favourite is Red Letter which is a tick game based on the letters of the alphabet.
